title: Drawing, "Chariot with the Hours", 1805
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of red chalk on paper
inscribed: Inscribed: venere portata dalle ore in cielo; Gabinetto dedicato a Venere; Toletta di venere; venere piace  marte; giudizio di paride; Adone e Venere.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Decorative project showing central quadrant with Venus carried through skies in chariot; eight octagonals with cupid and angels. Tondo showing history of Venus.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Chariot with the Hours", 1805.
1805. Pen and brown ink over traces of red chalk on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3306.
